column6: ka exkan Debbes tha arridtczan wuerſſon ſemmes -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),kà debbeſîs tà arirdſan zemes wirsû -> Old orthography, 1739,kā debesīs, tā arī virs zemes -> Modern orthography,kaa debesiis taa arii virs zemes -> Internet-style,

Tows praetcz noteſe -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),Taws prahts lai noteek -> Old orthography, 1739,Tavs prāts lai notiek -> Modern orthography,Tavs praats lai notiek -> Internet-style,

Vnbe nhe wedde mums exkan kaerbenaſchenne -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),Un ne eeweddi muhs eekſch kahrdinaſchanas -> Old orthography, 1739,Un neieved mūs kārdināšanā -> Modern orthography,Un neieved muus kaardinaashanaa -> Internet-style,

Sweetyttz thope totws waerdtcz -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),Swehtits lai top taws wahrds -> Old orthography, 1739,Svētīts lai top tavs vārds -> Modern orthography,Sveetiits lai top tavs vaards -> Internet-style,

Muuſze Thews exkan tho Debbes -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),Muhſu Tehvs debbeſîs -> Old orthography, 1739,Mūsu tēvs debesīs -> Modern orthography,Muusu teevs debesiis -> Internet-style,

Muſze beniſke mayſe bobe mums ſdjoben. -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),Muhsu deeniſchtu maizi dod mums ſchodeen -> Old orthography, 1739,Mūsu dienišķo maizi dod mums šodien -> Modern orthography,Muusu dienishkjo maizi dod mums shodien -> Internet-style,

Aefto thouwa gir ta walſtibe -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),Jo tew peederr ta walſtiba -> Old orthography, 1739,Jo tev pieder valstība -> Modern orthography,Jo tev pieder valstiiba. -> Internet-style,

vnbe tas ſpeez vnb tas Goobtcz tur muſſige -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),un tas ſpehks un tas gods muhſchigi [later muhzigi] -> Old orthography, 1739,spēks un gods mūžīgi -> Modern orthography,speeks un gods muuzhiigi -> Internet-style,
Amen -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),Amen -> Old orthography, 1739,Āmen -> Modern orthography,Aamen -> Internet-style,

Seth atpeſthmums no to loune -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),bet atpeſti muhs no ta launa [later łauna] -> Old orthography, 1739,bet atpestī mūs no ļauna -> Modern orthography,bet atpestii muus no ljauna -> Internet-style,

ka mehs pammettam muſſims parabenekims -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),kà arri mehs pamettam ſaweem parrahdneekeem -> Old orthography, 1739,kā arī mēs piedodam saviem parādniekiem -> Modern orthography,kaa arii mees piedodam saviem paraadniekiem -> Internet-style,

Vnbe pammet mums muſſe parrabe -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),Un pametti mums muhſu parradus [later parahdus] -> Old orthography, 1739,Un piedod mums mūsu parādus -> Modern orthography,Un piedod mums muusu paraadus -> Internet-style,

Enaka mums touwe walſtibe. -> First orthography,(Cosmographia Universalis, 1544),Lai nahk tawa walſtiba -> Old orthography, 1739,Lai nāk tava valstība -> Modern orthography,Lai naak tava valstiiba -> Internet-style,
